entry.title: IN EFFECT, Lewisporte
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 9:30 PM NDT Wednesday 01 December 0

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Rain, 4.3°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Gander Int'l Airport 08:30 AM NDT Saturday 28 May 2016
Condition: Light Rain
Temperature: 4.3°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.1 kPa falling
Visibility: 11.3 km
Humidity: 93 %
Dewpoint: 3.3°C
Wind: SSE 21 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Saturday: Rain. High plus 5.
entry.summary: Rain. Fog patches developing this afternoon. Amount 10 mm except 20 mm in areas of heaviest rain. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40. High plus 5. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NDT Saturday 28 May 2016

entry.title: Saturday night: Rain mixed with snow. Low zero.
entry.summary: Rain becoming mixed with snow this evening and ending after midnight then cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Fog patches. Rainfall amount 5 mm. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming northeast 20 gusting to 40 this evening. Low zero. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NDT Saturday 28 May 2016

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High 7 except 13 inland. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries early in the morning. Clearing in the morning. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Wind north 20 km/h becoming light in the morning. High 7 except 13 inland. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NDT Saturday 28 May 2016
